alert.note: Alert for Marathon (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 11:09AM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Marathon County through NOON CDT... At 1109 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Council Grounds State Park, or 9 miles northwest of Wausau, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Wausau around 1115 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Sunset, Hamburg, Nutterville, Glandon and Little Chicago. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
